definitions.text: a dark oil consisting mainly of hydrocarbons

examples: managed to make a crude splint
a crude cabin of logs with bark still on them
full of language so vulgar it should have been edited

definitions.text: belonging to an early stage of technical development; characterized by simplicity and (often) crudeness
examples: the crude weapons and rude agricultural implements of early man
primitive living conditions in the Appalachian mountains

definitions.text: devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment
examples: facing the stark reality of the deadline

definitions.text: not processed or subjected to analysis
